description: double portrait; Mr. Gibson in upper portrait in an oval frame facing left and looking over right shoulder; wearing flat collar and cloak;  Mrs. Gibson in lower portrait   in an oval composition but unframed; half length portrait facing slightly left and looking out; wearing cloak with hood, pleated collar; arms crossed
marks:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in b See Inscription
title: Portraits of  Mr. Gibson and  Mrs. Gibson
